20101230020146.000|20101230020150.000|CC1|NEWSHOUR HAS BEEN PROVIDED BY:  
20101230020150.000|20101230020150.000|CC1|>> FOR THREE HOURS A WEEK, I'M A
20101230020150.000|20101230020152.000|CC1|COACH, BUT WHEN I WAS DIAGNOSED 
20101230020152.000|20101230020153.000|CC1|WITH PROSTATE CANCER, I NEEDED A
20101230020153.000|20101230020155.000|CC1|COACH.                          
20101230020155.000|20101230020156.000|CC1|OUR DOCTOR WAS GREAT, BUT WITH  
20101230020156.000|20101230020157.000|CC1|SO MANY TOUGH DECISIONS, I FELT 
20101230020157.000|20101230020159.000|CC1|LOST.                           
20101230020159.000|20101230020200.000|CC1|UNITED HEALTHCARE OFFERED A     
20101230020200.000|20101230020201.000|CC1|SPECIALLY TRAINED R.N., WHO     
20101230020201.000|20101230020202.000|CC1|HELPED US WEIGH AND UNDERSTAND  
20101230020202.000|20101230020204.000|CC1|ALL OUR OPTIONS.                
20101230020204.000|20101230020206.000|CC1|FOR ME, CANCER WAS AS SCARY AS A
20101230020206.000|20101230020208.000|CC1|FASTBALL IS TO SOME OF THESE    
20101230020208.000|20101230020209.000|CC1|KIDS, BUT MY COACH HAD HIT THAT 
20101230020209.000|20101230020210.000|CC1|PITCH BEFORE.                   
20101230020210.000|20101230020211.000|CC1|>> TURNING DATA INTO USEFUL     
20101230020211.000|20101230020212.000|CC1|ANSWERS.

20101230020333.000|20101230020334.000|CC1|>> Suarez: THE NATION'S LARGEST 
20101230020334.000|20101230020336.000|CC1|CITY FACED ANOTHER DAY IN THE   
20101230020336.000|20101230020337.000|CC1|THROES OF SNOW, AS CREWS LABORED
20101230020337.000|20101230020339.000|CC1|TO CLEAR STREETS.               
20101230020339.000|20101230020341.000|CC1|THERE WERE CALLS FOR AND        
20101230020341.000|20101230020342.000|CC1|PROMISES OF INVESTIGATIONS INTO 
20101230020342.000|20101230020344.000|CC1|THE AFTERMATH OF THE CHRISTMAS  
20101230020344.000|20101230020347.000|CC1|WEEKEND BLIZZARD.               
20101230020347.000|20101230020348.000|CC1|>> IT'S TERRIBLE, ABSOLUTELY    
20101230020348.000|20101230020351.000|CC1|TERRIBLE!                       
20101230020351.000|20101230020353.000|CC1|>> Suarez: THREE DAYS ON, AND   
20101230020353.000|20101230020354.000|CC1|NEW YORK STREETS WERE STILL     
20101230020354.000|20101230020355.000|CC1|LITTERED WITH NEARLY TWO FEET OF
20101230020355.000|20101230020357.000|CC1|SNOW, WHILE PEOPLE TRIED TO DIG 
20101230020357.000|20101230020400.000|CC1|OUT CARS AND PATIENCE WORE THIN.
20101230020400.000|20101230020402.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE GONNA CLEAN THE MIDDLE
20101230020402.000|20101230020403.000|CC1|OF 36TH STREET?                 
20101230020403.000|20101230020404.000|CC1|>> YES, YES, I HAVE TO.         
20101230020404.000|20101230020406.000|CC1|>> WHY DO YOU HAVE TO.          
20101230020406.000|20101230020409.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE WHO'S GOING DO IT?"  
20101230020409.000|20101230020410.000|CC1|>> Suarez: ON BLOCK AFTER BLOCK,
20101230020410.000|20101230020412.000|CC1|ABANDONED CARS CLOGGED STREETS, 
20101230020412.000|20101230020413.000|CC1|MAKING SNOW REMOVAL ALL BUT     
20101230020413.000|20101230020416.000|CC1|IMPOSSIBLE.                     
20101230020416.000|20101230020419.000|CC1|THE SUNDAY STORM ALSO TRAPPED   
20101230020419.000|20101230020420.000|CC1|600 CITY BUSES.                 
20101230020420.000|20101230020422.000|CC1|MOST WERE DUG OUT, BUT AT LEAST 
20101230020422.000|20101230020424.000|CC1|50 REMAINED TRAPPED TODAY ON    
20101230020424.000|20101230020427.000|CC1|UNPLOWED ROADS.

20101230020429.000|20101230020431.000|CC1|EMERGENCY VEHICLES ALSO GOT

20101230020440.000|20101230020442.000|CC1|LEFT WITH WHEELS SPINNING IN THE
20101230020442.000|20101230020444.000|CC1|STORM'S WAKE.

20101230020448.000|20101230020451.000|CC1|IT SHOWED A CITY CREW CRASHING

20101230020607.000|20101230020611.000|CC1|CITY HAS A RIGHT TO EXPECT.

20101230020612.000|20101230020614.000|CC1|RUNWAYS WERE FINALLY OPEN AT THE
20101230020614.000|20101230020616.000|CC1|THREE AIRPORTS SERVING THE NEW

20101230020620.000|20101230020621.000|CC1|COULD TAKE DAYS TO ACCOMMODATE  
20101230020621.000|20101230020623.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF PASSENGERS STRANDED
20101230020623.000|20101230020626.000|CC1|NATIONWIDE.

20101230020627.000|20101230020628.000|CC1|SAYS MOST STREETS SHOULD BE     
20101230020628.000|20101230020632.000|CC1|PLOWED BY TOMORROW MORNING.     
20101230020632.000|20101230020634.000|CC1|FOR MORE ON HOW THE CITY IS     
20101230020634.000|20101230020636.000|CC1|BEARING UP, WE TURN TO          
20101230020636.000|20101230020637.000|CC1|BOB HENNELLY, SENIOR REPORTER AT
20101230020637.000|20101230020644.000|CC1|WNYC PUBLIC RADIO.

20101230020648.000|20101230020650.000|CC1|DAY, ARE 8.5 MILLION PEOPLE A   
20101230020650.000|20101230020653.000|CC1|LITTLE CLOSER TO GETTING BACK TO
20101230020653.000|20101230020653.000|CC1|NORMAL LIFE?                    
20101230020653.000|20101230020654.000|CC1|>> INDEED THEY ARE.             
20101230020654.000|20101230020658.000|CC1|WE'RE DOWN TO JUST 50 OF THOSE  
20101230020658.000|20101230020701.000|CC1|FROM THE BUSES JAMMED UP.       
20101230020701.000|20101230020702.000|CC1|TO CONTRAST THE STATE OF NEW    
20101230020702.000|20101230020704.000|CC1|JERSEY'S RESPONSE, IT WAS THE   
20101230020704.000|20101230020705.000|CC1|SAME STORM BUT TWO VERY         
20101230020705.000|20101230020706.000|CC1|DIFFERENT TAKES WITH TO         
20101230020706.000|20101230020707.000|CC1|DIFFERENT RESULTS.              
20101230020707.000|20101230020709.000|CC1|THEIR ACTING GOVERNOR, STEVE    
20101230020709.000|20101230020711.000|CC1|SWEENEY, DECLARED A STATE OF    
20101230020711.000|20101230020713.000|CC1|EMERGENCY AT 6:00 P.M. THE NIGHT
20101230020713.000|20101230020713.000|CC1|BEFORE.

20101230020715.000|20101230020717.000|CC1|THAT GAVE HIM THE POWER TO KEEP

20101230020718.000|20101230020720.000|CC1|>> Suarez: AN INTERESTING       
20101230020720.000|20101230020721.000|CC1|CONTRAST WITH NEW JERSEY.       
20101230020721.000|20101230020723.000|CC1|WHAT ABOUT INSIDE THE CITY      
20101230020723.000|20101230020723.000|CC1|ITSELF.

20101230020728.000|20101230020729.000|CC1|THAN OTHERS?                    
20101230020729.000|20101230020732.000|CC1|>> RIGHT NOW, AS WE SPEAK, WE   
20101230020732.000|20101230020733.000|CC1|HAVE SITUATIONS IN THE SOUTH -- 
20101230020733.000|20101230020735.000|CC1|BROOKLYN AREA, STATEN ISLAND,   
20101230020735.000|20101230020736.000|CC1|WESTERN QUEENS, PARTICULARLY    
20101230020736.000|20101230020738.000|CC1|PLACES WHERE WE SEE THAT PEOPLE 
20101230020738.000|20101230020740.000|CC1|DON'T HAVE MASS TRANSIT -- YOU  
20101230020740.000|20101230020742.000|CC1|KNOW, NEW YORK CITY IS NOT ALL  
20101230020742.000|20101230020744.000|CC1|INTEGRATED WITH SUBWAYS AND     
20101230020744.000|20101230020747.000|CC1|BUSES, SO PEOPLE ARE ALMOST A   
20101230020747.000|20101230020749.000|CC1|SUBURBAN EXISTENCE DEPENDENT ON 
20101230020749.000|20101230020749.000|CC1|THEIR CAR.                      
20101230020749.000|20101230020751.000|CC1|THE OTHER THING WE LEARNED IS   
20101230020751.000|20101230020753.000|CC1|THE 911 SYSTEM WAS OVERWHELMED. 
20101230020753.000|20101230020754.000|CC1|THIS IS A CRITICAL PIECE OF     
20101230020754.000|20101230020755.000|CC1|INFORMATION.                    
20101230020755.000|20101230020756.000|CC1|WE HAVE SOME 50,000 CALLS ON    
20101230020756.000|20101230020757.000|CC1|MONDAY.                         
20101230020757.000|20101230020759.000|CC1|ONLY ONE IN FIVE, ACCORDING TO  
20101230020759.000|20101230020801.000|CC1|POLICE WERE ACTUALLY EMERGENCIES
20101230020801.000|20101230020805.000|CC1|COMPARED TO 55,000 ON SEPTEMBER 
20101230020805.000|20101230020805.000|CC1|11.                             
20101230020805.000|20101230020806.000|CC1|>> Suarez: HOW ABOUT NOW.       
20101230020806.000|20101230020808.000|CC1|IF YOU FEEL A SERIOUS ILLNESS   
20101230020808.000|20101230020810.000|CC1|COMING ON THIS EVENING AND YOU  
20101230020810.000|20101230020812.000|CC1|MAKE A 911 CALL AND YOU ARE ON  
20101230020812.000|20101230020814.000|CC1|AN OUTER BOROUGH SIDE STREET, IS
20101230020814.000|20101230020815.000|CC1|SOMEBODY ABLE TO GET TO YOU?    
20101230020815.000|20101230020818.000|CC1|>> I THINK THEY'RE IN MUCH      
20101230020818.000|20101230020819.000|CC1|BETTER SHAPE.                   
20101230020819.000|20101230020821.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WITH KIDNEY DIALYSIS 
20101230020821.000|20101230020823.000|CC1|WHO HAVE A DAILY RELATIONSHIP   
20101230020823.000|20101230020825.000|CC1|WITH A HOSPITAL, THAT'S WHERE   
20101230020825.000|20101230020827.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOOD CONNECTION MATTERS.
20101230020827.000|20101230020829.000|CC1|>> Suarez: THE MAYOR'S CHANGE IN
20101230020829.000|20101230020831.000|CC1|TONE WAS STRIKING TODAY FROM A  
20101230020831.000|20101230020833.000|CC1|CAN OF-DO AND UPBEAT MESSAGE TO 
20101230020833.000|20101230020837.000|CC1|THE CITY EARLY ON TO A MORE     
20101230020837.000|20101230020838.000|CC1|SOMBER ONE.                     
20101230020838.000|20101230020841.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT HAS TO DO WITH    
20101230020841.000|20101230020842.000|CC1|AWARENESS AND HOW MIDDLE        
20101230020842.000|20101230020844.000|CC1|MANAGEMENT WAS GETTING HIM FACTS
20101230020844.000|20101230020845.000|CC1|ON THE GROUND.                  
20101230020845.000|20101230020846.000|CC1|>> Suarez: SO WHAT'S CHANGED    
20101230020846.000|20101230020846.000|CC1|THERE?

20101230020854.000|20101230020856.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY, BUT WE DO HAVE   
20101230020856.000|20101230020900.000|CC1|TABLOID PRESS HOAR, SO WE HAD

20101230020908.000|20101230020910.000|CC1|THE WEATHER BUT THEY DO CONTROL

20101230020914.000|20101230020916.000|CC1|CENTERED ON THE MAYOR THIS

20101230021518.000|20101230021520.000|CC1|FEARING A FULL-SCALE CONFLICT,  
20101230021520.000|20101230021522.000|CC1|THE U.S. IS NOW PLANNING FOR THE

20101230021524.000|20101230021530.000|CC1|EMBASSY IN ABIDJAN.             
20101230021530.000|20101230021531.000|CC1|FOR MORE WE TURN TO CHRISTOPHER 
20101230021531.000|20101230021531.000|CC1|FOMUNYOH, SENIOR ASSOCIATE FOR  
20101230021531.000|20101230021532.000|CC1|CENTRAL AND WEST AFRICA AT THE  
20101230021532.000|20101230021533.000|CC1|NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC INSTITUTE.

20101230022212.000|20101230022239.000|CC1|>> WHEN WE SAID WE NEED         
20101230022239.000|20101230022243.000|CC1|THE DUMERANS FACE EVICTION.     
20101230022243.000|20101230022245.000|CC1|THE DUMERANS ARE PART OF A      
20101230022245.000|20101230022247.000|CC1|THREE-STEP MOVEMENT IN BOSTON.  
20101230022247.000|20101230022248.000|CC1|STEP ONE, PUBLIC PROTESTS LIKE  
20101230022248.000|20101230022252.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20101230022252.000|20101230022255.000|CC1|STAGED BY NEIGHBORHOOD ACTIVISTS
20101230022255.000|20101230022257.000|CC1|CITY LIFE VITA URBANA.

20101230022259.000|20101230022301.000|CC1|OF HARVARD LEGAL AID TO DRAG OUT
20101230022301.000|20101230022302.000|CC1|THE PROCESS.                    
20101230022302.000|20101230022305.000|CC1|>> I'M A STUDENT AT HARVARD LAW 
20101230022305.000|20101230022305.000|CC1|SCHOOL.                         
20101230022305.000|20101230022306.000|CC1|>> DAVE GROSSMAN DIRECTS THE    
20101230022306.000|20101230022307.000|CC1|LEGAL EFFORT.                   
20101230022307.000|20101230022308.000|CC1|>> RELATIVELY SOON INTO IT, WE  
20101230022308.000|20101230022310.000|CC1|REALIZED WE WERE MISSING A      
20101230022310.000|20101230022311.000|CC1|PIECE, WHICH WAS THE END GAME.  
20101230022311.000|20101230022312.000|CC1|WE COULD STOP BANKS.            
20101230022312.000|20101230022314.000|CC1|WE COULD BEAT BANKS UP AND STOP 
20101230022314.000|20101230022316.000|CC1|THEM FROM EVICTING PEOPLE AFTER 
20101230022316.000|20101230022317.000|CC1|FORECLOSURE, BUT THEY STILL     
20101230022317.000|20101230022319.000|CC1|OWNED THE PROPERTY.             
20101230022319.000|20101230022321.000|CC1|THAT WASN'T A STABLE            
20101230022321.000|20101230022321.000|CC1|EQUILIBRIUM.                    
20101230022321.000|20101230022323.000|CC1|WE HAD TO FIND SOMEONE TO BUY   
20101230022323.000|20101230022323.000|CC1|THE PROPERTY BACK AND THE       
20101230022323.000|20101230022325.000|CC1|OBVIOUS SOLUTION WAS LET THE    
20101230022325.000|20101230022327.000|CC1|FORMER OWNER BUY THE PROPERTY   
20101230022327.000|20101230022327.000|CC1|BACK.                           
20101230022327.000|20101230022329.000|CC1|>> ENTER B.C.C. OR BOSTON       
20101230022329.000|20101230022331.000|CC1|COMMUNITY CAPITAL, THE CRUCIAL  
20101230022331.000|20101230022333.000|CC1|THIRD STEP OF THE PROGRAM.      
20101230022333.000|20101230022335.000|CC1|IT'S TACKLING A PROBLEM MILLIONS
20101230022335.000|20101230022337.000|CC1|OF UNDERWATER HOMEOWNERS FACE.  
20101230022337.000|20101230022340.000|CC1|THEY COULD AFFORD A             
20101230022340.000|20101230022341.000|CC1|MARKET-PRICED MORTGAGE BUT THEIR
20101230022341.000|20101230022343.000|CC1|BANKS FORECLOSED INSTEAD SO     
20101230022343.000|20101230022346.000|CC1|THEY'LL HAVE TO SELL AT MARKET  
20101230022346.000|20101230022350.000|CC1|PRICE ANYWAY.                   
20101230022350.000|20101230022351.000|CC1|ALICE CHERRY.                   
20101230022351.000|20101230022353.000|CC1|>> IF WE CAN FIND AN OWNER WHO  
20101230022353.000|20101230022356.000|CC1|HAS THE ABILITY TO PAY A        
20101230022356.000|20101230022357.000|CC1|MORTGAGE AT ROUGHLY MARKET RATE 
20101230022357.000|20101230022400.000|CC1|FOR THAT HOME, THEN WE GO OUT TO
20101230022400.000|20101230022402.000|CC1|THE OWNER OF THE PROPERTY, OR   
20101230022402.000|20101230022404.000|CC1|THE SERVICE, WHOEVER IT IS WHO  
20101230022404.000|20101230022406.000|CC1|HAS CHARGE OF THE MORTGAGE AND  
20101230022406.000|20101230022407.000|CC1|WE ATTEMPT TO NEGOTIATE A       
20101230022407.000|20101230022409.000|CC1|PURCHASE FROM THAT ENTITY.      
20101230022409.000|20101230022410.000|CC1|ONCE WE'VE BOUGHT, THEN WE CAN  
20101230022410.000|20101230022413.000|CC1|TURN AROUND AND SELL BACK TO THE
20101230022413.000|20101230022413.000|CC1|HOMEOWNER.                      
20101230022413.000|20101230022415.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE BULK OF        
20101230022415.000|20101230022416.000|CC1|B.C.C.'S FUNDING COMES FROM     
20101230022416.000|20101230022418.000|CC1|INVESTORS AND FOUNDATIONS ALONG 
20101230022418.000|20101230022419.000|CC1|WITH SOME GOVERNMENT MONEY.     
20101230022419.000|20101230022422.000|CC1|FIRST, B.C.C. BUYS A PROPERTY AT
20101230022422.000|20101230022424.000|CC1|ROUGHLY MARKET VALUE, TYPICALLY 
20101230022424.000|20101230022426.000|CC1|HALF OR LESS OF WHAT THE        
20101230022426.000|20101230022428.000|CC1|FORECLOSED HOMEOWNER OWES.      
20101230022428.000|20101230022430.000|CC1|SECOND, B.C.C. SELLS IT BACK TO 
20101230022430.000|20101230022432.000|CC1|THE HOMEOWNER WITH A 30-YEAR    
20101230022432.000|20101230022434.000|CC1|MORTGAGE AT ABOUT 6% AT THE     
20101230022434.000|20101230022437.000|CC1|MOMENT, MARKING UP THE PURCHASE 
20101230022437.000|20101230022439.000|CC1|PRICE BY 25% AS A CUSHION       
20101230022439.000|20101230022440.000|CC1|AGAINST DEFAULT.                
20101230022440.000|20101230022442.000|CC1|TO FURTHER ENSURE THAT ITS      
20101230022442.000|20101230022446.000|CC1|INVESTORS GET THEIR MONEY BACK, 
20101230022446.000|20101230022449.000|CC1|B.C.C.'S EVALUATION IS TOUGH.   
20101230022449.000|20101230022450.000|CC1|LESS THAN HALF OF HOMEOWNERS    
20101230022450.000|20101230022452.000|CC1|QUALIFY.                        
20101230022452.000|20101230022453.000|CC1|MOREOVER, ONCE ACCEPTED --      
20101230022453.000|20101230022454.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE MORTGAGES THAT ARE 
20101230022454.000|20101230022456.000|CC1|PAID EVERY TWO WEEKS -- IN FACT,
20101230022456.000|20101230022458.000|CC1|WHAT WOOF DONE IS TO TIE IT TO  
20101230022458.000|20101230022459.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S PAY CHECKS.            
20101230022459.000|20101230022500.000|CC1|WE REQUIRE AUTOMATIC DEPOSIT OF 
20101230022500.000|20101230022502.000|CC1|THE PAY CHECK AND AUTOMATIC     
20101230022502.000|20101230022503.000|CC1|WITHDRAWAL OF THE MORTGAGE.     
20101230022503.000|20101230022505.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THESE ARE PRETTY   
20101230022505.000|20101230022507.000|CC1|STRINGENT TERMS.                
20101230022507.000|20101230022512.000|CC1|>> YES, BUT WE'VE PUT ONTO IT   
20101230022512.000|20101230022513.000|CC1|SOMETHING WE CALL A             
20101230022513.000|20101230022514.000|CC1|SHARED-APPRECIATION MORTGAGE.   
20101230022514.000|20101230022516.000|CC1|WHAT THAT MEANS IN SIMPLE TERMS 
20101230022516.000|20101230022517.000|CC1|SHOULD THE MARKET COME BACK,    
20101230022517.000|20101230022518.000|CC1|SOMEONE WHO IS FINANCED WITH US 
20101230022518.000|20101230022520.000|CC1|AND PAYING ROUGHLY HALF OF WHAT 
20101230022520.000|20101230022522.000|CC1|THEY WOULD HAVE PAID IN THE PAST

20101230022523.000|20101230022525.000|CC1|HALF OF WHAT THE APPRECIATION   
20101230022525.000|20101230022525.000|CC1|IS.

20101230023107.000|20101230023108.000|CC1|>> I THINK THERE WAS CLEARLY A  
20101230023108.000|20101230023111.000|CC1|WAVE OF DISCONTENT AGAINST      
20101230023111.000|20101230023111.000|CC1|WASHINGTON.                     
20101230023111.000|20101230023112.000|CC1|IT WAS TAKEN OUT ON THE

20101230023128.000|20101230023130.000|CC1|RESONATED AFTER POUNDING IT AWAY

20101230023134.000|20101230023136.000|CC1|DAKOTANS -- YOU KNOW, WE THOUGHT

20101230023138.000|20101230023140.000|CC1|ACCOMPLISHMENT, AND WE KEPT IT  
20101230023140.000|20101230023141.000|CC1|CLOSE, BUT CLEARLY, GIVEN THAT  
20101230023141.000|20101230023145.000|CC1|IT WAS A WAVE ELECTION, GIVEN   
20101230023145.000|20101230023147.000|CC1|THE RESOURCES THAT WERE SPENT, I
20101230023147.000|20101230023150.000|CC1|THINK THOSE ARE PROBABLY THE TWO

20101230023156.000|20101230023158.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: YOU HAVE SAID THAT

20101230023205.000|20101230023207.000|CC1|>> I STAND BY THE RECORD.

20101230023231.000|20101230023233.000|CC1|PROUD OF THE RACE THAT WE RAN.  
20101230023233.000|20101230023234.000|CC1|>> Woodruff: IS IT YOUR SENSE   
20101230023234.000|20101230023237.000|CC1|THAT -- THAT THE CIRCUMSTANCES  
20101230023237.000|20101230023239.000|CC1|CHANGED IN WASHINGTON THAT      
20101230023239.000|20101230023241.000|CC1|CAUSED VOTERS THAT LOOK AT THIS 
20101230023241.000|20101230023242.000|CC1|ELECTION DIFFERENTLY?           
20101230023242.000|20101230023245.000|CC1|>> I THOUGHT IT WAS GOING TO BE 
20101230023245.000|20101230023246.000|CC1|TRICKY, GIVEN THE ECONOMIC      
20101230023246.000|20101230023247.000|CC1|CIRCUMSTANCES THE COUNTRY FOUND 
20101230023247.000|20101230023249.000|CC1|ITSELF IN, GIVEN THE VERY HIGH  
20101230023249.000|20101230023251.000|CC1|EXPECTATIONS OF A LOST DIFFERENT
20101230023251.000|20101230023253.000|CC1|SEGMENTS OF THE ELECTORATE HAD

20101230023309.000|20101230023312.000|CC1|>> I SURE TRIED TO HELP DELIVER 
20101230023312.000|20101230023314.000|CC1|COMPROMISE, CONSENSUS,

20101230023851.000|20101230023852.000|CC1|SAM LAZARO REPORTS FROM THE     
20101230023852.000|20101230023856.000|CC1|INDIAN CAPITAL OF NEW DELHI.    
20101230023856.000|20101230023857.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TO REALLY KNOW WHAT
20101230023857.000|20101230023858.000|CC1|IT'S LIKE TO LIVE IN AN         
20101230023858.000|20101230023900.000|CC1|OVERPOPULATED PLACE, WATCH THE  
20101230023900.000|20101230023902.000|CC1|DAILY VIGIL FOR THE MUNICIPAL   
20101230023902.000|20101230023904.000|CC1|WATER TANKER TRUCK HERE IN      
20101230023904.000|20101230023905.000|CC1|DELHI'S VASANT KUNJ OR THOUSANDS
20101230023905.000|20101230023906.000|CC1|OF SIMILAR NEIGHBORHOODS ACROSS 
20101230023906.000|20101230023912.000|CC1|URBAN INDIA.                    
20101230023912.000|20101230023914.000|CC1|CHANDA LIVES IN AN ILLEGAL      
20101230023914.000|20101230023915.000|CC1|SETTLEMENT HERE IN THIS CITY OF 
20101230023915.000|20101230023917.000|CC1|16 MILLION AND GROWING.         
20101230023917.000|20101230023919.000|CC1|ON THIS DAY, SHE LEFT HER JOB AS
20101230023919.000|20101230023921.000|CC1|A DAILY LABORER MID-MORNING TO  
20101230023921.000|20101230023931.000|CC1|RUN BACK AND COLLECT SOME WATER.
20101230023931.000|20101230023931.000|CC1|EXACTLY WHEN THE TRUCK ARRIVES  
20101230023931.000|20101230023934.000|CC1|IS ANYONE'S GUESS.              
20101230023934.000|20101230023935.000|CC1|EVERY DAY, THESE WOMEN SAY THEY 
20101230023935.000|20101230023938.000|CC1|SPEND FOUR HOURS A DAY-- THEIR  
20101230023938.000|20101230023939.000|CC1|CHILDREN OFTEN MISS SCHOOL--    
20101230023939.000|20101230023941.000|CC1|JUST WAITING FOR THE ONLY SOURCE
20101230023941.000|20101230023943.000|CC1|OF WATER FOR THEIR DAILY        
20101230023943.000|20101230023952.000|CC1|CONSUMPTION AND SANITATION.     
20101230023952.000|20101230023954.000|CC1|>> ( translated ): WE HAVE TO   
20101230023954.000|20101230023955.000|CC1|USE THE OPEN AND THERE ARE MEN  
20101230023955.000|20101230023959.000|CC1|THERE AS WELL.                  
20101230023959.000|20101230024000.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JYOTHI SHARMA, A   
20101230024000.000|20101230024002.000|CC1|CONSERVATION ACTIVIST WHO RUNS A
20101230024002.000|20101230024004.000|CC1|SMALL AID AGENCY SAYS THE CITY  
20101230024004.000|20101230024008.000|CC1|IS SIMPLY OVERWHELMED           
20101230024008.000|20101230024013.000|CC1|>> EVERY YEAR, WE GET AN        
20101230024013.000|20101230024014.000|CC1|ADDITIONAL 500,000 TO 700,000   
20101230024014.000|20101230024016.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20101230024016.000|20101230024017.000|CC1|THAT'S THE KIND OF POPULATION   
20101230024017.000|20101230024019.000|CC1|GROWTH, THE MAJORITY IS OF LOWER
20101230024019.000|20101230024020.000|CC1|INCOME, WHO ARE POOR, TYPICALLY 
20101230024020.000|20101230024021.000|CC1|THEY COME AND SETTLE IN THESE   
20101230024021.000|20101230024023.000|CC1|KIND OF SETTLEMENTS.            
20101230024023.000|20101230024025.000|CC1|ONLY 27% OF THIS CITY IS A      
20101230024025.000|20101230024029.000|CC1|PLANNED CITY.                   
20101230024029.000|20101230024030.000|CC1|YOU CANNOT STOP THEM COMING     
20101230024030.000|20101230024031.000|CC1|BECAUSE THAT'S THE ONLY PLACE   
20101230024031.000|20101230024033.000|CC1|THEY GET SOME LIVELIHOOD.       
20101230024033.000|20101230024035.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SHARMA LIVES IN A  
20101230024035.000|20101230024036.000|CC1|MIDDLE CLASS ENCLAVE BEHIND A   
20101230024036.000|20101230024038.000|CC1|WALL BUT RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET
20101230024038.000|20101230024039.000|CC1|FROM THE SLUM.                  
20101230024039.000|20101230024040.000|CC1|WHEN IT COMES TO WATER SUPPLY,  
20101230024040.000|20101230024042.000|CC1|THEY'RE BETTER OFF HERE, BUT    
20101230024042.000|20101230024043.000|CC1|HARDLY WELL OFF.                
20101230024043.000|20101230024045.000|CC1|>> IT DOES NOT GET VERY MUCH    
20101230024045.000|20101230024046.000|CC1|WATER, ABOUT 45 MINUTES IN THE  
20101230024046.000|20101230024056.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20101230024056.000|20101230024056.000|CC1|THESE ARE ALL PIPELINES LAID BY 
20101230024056.000|20101230024057.000|CC1|PEOPLE THEMSELVES.              
20101230024057.000|20101230024059.000|CC1|THESE PIPELINES THEN GO TO      
20101230024059.000|20101230024101.000|CC1|ONLINE MOTORS.                  
20101230024101.000|20101230024103.000|CC1|THEY KNOW THE TIME WHEN WATER IS
20101230024103.000|20101230024104.000|CC1|RELEASED INTO THE PIPELINE      
20101230024104.000|20101230024106.000|CC1|SYSTEM SO AT THAT TIME PEOPLE   
20101230024106.000|20101230024108.000|CC1|SWITCH ON THESE MOTORS AND THESE
20101230024108.000|20101230024110.000|CC1|MOTORS SUCK WATER FROM THE      
20101230024110.000|20101230024112.000|CC1|PIPELINES INTO THESE STORAGE    
20101230024112.000|20101230024114.000|CC1|TANKS.                          
20101230024114.000|20101230024115.000|CC1|AND AT SOME TIME DURING THE DAY 
20101230024115.000|20101230024117.000|CC1|THEY HAVE ANOTHER MOTOR WHICH   
20101230024117.000|20101230024119.000|CC1|PUMPS THIS UP TO THE ROOFTOP AND
20101230024119.000|20101230024121.000|CC1|FROM THERE THEY GET THEIR SUPPLY
20101230024121.000|20101230024136.000|CC1|OF WATER WHENEVER THEY WANT.    
20101230024136.000|20101230024137.000|CC1|>> THESE MOTORS, THEY ACTUALLY  
20101230024137.000|20101230024138.000|CC1|CREATE A SUCTION VACUUM SO IF   
20101230024138.000|20101230024141.000|CC1|THERE IS NO WATER IN THE        
20101230024141.000|20101230024143.000|CC1|PIPELINES, ANY CRACK IN THE PIPE
20101230024143.000|20101230024145.000|CC1|WILL ALLOW SEWAGE OR DIRTY WATER
20101230024145.000|20101230024147.000|CC1|TO GET INTO THE PIPELINES AND   
20101230024147.000|20101230024148.000|CC1|THAT ACTUALLY BECOMES A BIG     
20101230024148.000|20101230024150.000|CC1|PROBLEM, CAUSE FOR DISEASES     
20101230024150.000|20101230024152.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20101230024152.000|20101230024154.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN HER OWN KITCHEN,
20101230024154.000|20101230024155.000|CC1|SHARMA HAS A FILTRATION SYSTEM  
20101230024155.000|20101230024156.000|CC1|AND LIKE OTHER MIDDLE CLASS     
20101230024156.000|20101230024159.000|CC1|INDIANS CAN BUY HER WAY TO A    
20101230024159.000|20101230024206.000|CC1|SECURE WATER SUPPLY.            
20101230024206.000|20101230024207.000|CC1|ACROSS THE STREET, MEANWHILE,   
20101230024207.000|20101230024209.000|CC1|RESIDENTS HAD TO WAIT UNTIL THE 
20101230024209.000|20101230024210.000|CC1|NEXT DAY FOR THE NEXT WATER     
20101230024210.000|20101230024218.000|CC1|TANKER.                         
20101230024218.000|20101230024219.000|CC1|DELHI'S WATER SITUATION IS RIPE 
20101230024219.000|20101230024227.000|CC1|FOR CONFLICT, SAYS SHARMA.      
20101230024227.000|20101230024227.000|CC1|>> NOW THE DAY THESE TANKERS    
20101230024227.000|20101230024228.000|CC1|STOPS COMING, I'M SURE THAT JUST
20101230024228.000|20101230024229.000|CC1|TO FEED THEIR CHILDREN THEY WILL
20101230024229.000|20101230024230.000|CC1|COME THERE AND THEY'LL BREAK    
20101230024230.000|20101230024231.000|CC1|INTO WATER TANKS NEITHER ON THE 
20101230024231.000|20101230024232.000|CC1|SECURITY NOR HUMANITARIAN       
20101230024232.000|20101230024234.000|CC1|FRONTS, WE WOULDN'T BE ABLE TO  
20101230024234.000|20101230024235.000|CC1|STOP THEM, SO IF THE WATER WARS 
20101230024235.000|20101230024236.000|CC1|HAPPEN, THEY WILL HAPPEN IN     
20101230024236.000|20101230024238.000|CC1|PLACES LIKE THIS.               
20101230024238.000|20101230024239.000|CC1|POPULATIONS ARE DENSE, RESOURCES
20101230024239.000|20101230024242.000|CC1|ARE DWINDLING ASPIRATIONS ARE   
20101230024242.000|20101230024243.000|CC1|HIGH, THIS IS WHERE THE CONFLICT
20101230024243.000|20101230024246.000|CC1|WILL BE.                        
20101230024246.000|20101230024246.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TO MAKE MATTERS    
20101230024246.000|20101230024247.000|CC1|WORSE, GROUNDWATER SUPPLIES ARE 
20101230024247.000|20101230024249.000|CC1|ALSO DWINDLING.                 
20101230024249.000|20101230024250.000|CC1|THE CITY PIPES FRESH WATER IN   
20101230024250.000|20101230024251.000|CC1|FROM DAMS AS FAR AS AWAY AS 200 
20101230024251.000|20101230024253.000|CC1|MILES.                          
20101230024253.000|20101230024255.000|CC1|IT'S SIMPLY UNSUSTAINABLE, GIVEN
20101230024255.000|20101230024257.000|CC1|NOT JUST POPULATION BUT ALSO    
20101230024257.000|20101230024259.000|CC1|ECONOMIC GROWTH IN INDIA, SAYS  
20101230024259.000|20101230024300.000|CC1|ASHOK JATLEY, A SCHOLAR AT THE  
20101230024300.000|20101230024302.000|CC1|ENVIRONMENTAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE
20101230024302.000|20101230024305.000|CC1|IN DELHI.                       
20101230024305.000|20101230024306.000|CC1|>> IT'S NOT JUST THE PRESSURE OF
20101230024306.000|20101230024308.000|CC1|NUMBERS.                        
20101230024308.000|20101230024312.000|CC1|AS YOU HAVE RATES OF GROWTH, 8%,
20101230024312.000|20101230024315.000|CC1|9%, 10%, YOUR LIFESTYLE CHANGES;
20101230024315.000|20101230024317.000|CC1|YOUR DIET IS DIFFERENT; YOU HAVE
20101230024317.000|20101230024319.000|CC1|SHOWERS AND SWIMMING POOLS AND  
20101230024319.000|20101230024322.000|CC1|ALL THAT SORT OF THING.         
20101230024322.000|20101230024325.000|CC1|SO THE WHOLE LIFESTYLE CHANGES  
20101230024325.000|20101230024327.000|CC1|AND THAT RESULTS IN INCREASED   
20101230024327.000|20101230024329.000|CC1|PER CAPITA CONSUMPTION OF WATER.
20101230024329.000|20101230024330.000|CC1|THAT ALSO NEEDS TO BE ATTENDED  
20101230024330.000|20101230024332.000|CC1|TO.                             
20101230024332.000|20101230024333.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOWEVER, HE SAYS   
20101230024333.000|20101230024334.000|CC1|THERE'S BEEN LITTLE ENTHUSIASM  
20101230024334.000|20101230024335.000|CC1|FOR ADDRESSING WATER ISSUES OR  
20101230024335.000|20101230024336.000|CC1|FOR PASSING OVERALL WATER       
20101230024336.000|20101230024339.000|CC1|POLICIES.                       
20101230024339.000|20101230024340.000|CC1|HE SAYS IT'S PARTICULARLY TRUE  
20101230024340.000|20101230024342.000|CC1|OF INDIA'S AGRICULTURE SECTOR,  
20101230024342.000|20101230024344.000|CC1|WHICH CONSUMES 80 PERCENT OF THE
20101230024344.000|20101230024346.000|CC1|COUNTRY'S FRESH WATER SUPPLY-   
20101230024346.000|20101230024349.000|CC1|HALF OF IT GOES TO WASTE.       
20101230024349.000|20101230024351.000|CC1|THE WATER TABLE IS DECLINING    
20101230024351.000|20101230024352.000|CC1|RAPIDLY IN THE BREADBASKET STATE
20101230024352.000|20101230024354.000|CC1|OF PUNJAB, FOR EXAMPLE, SEVERELY
20101230024354.000|20101230024356.000|CC1|IMPERILING UNDERGROUND AQUIFERS 
20101230024356.000|20101230024357.000|CC1|AND, ULTIMATELY FOOD PRODUCTION 
20101230024357.000|20101230024401.000|CC1|ITSELF.                         
20101230024401.000|20101230024403.000|CC1|FOR PUNJAB'S FARMERS, THE WATER 
20101230024403.000|20101230024403.000|CC1|FLOWS FREELY AND IT FLOWS FOR   
20101230024403.000|20101230024405.000|CC1|FREE.                           
20101230024405.000|20101230024406.000|CC1|SUBMERSIBLE PUMPS ARE SUBSIDIZED
20101230024406.000|20101230024407.000|CC1|BY THE GOVERNMENT, WHICH ALSO   
20101230024407.000|20101230024409.000|CC1|PROVIDES ELECTRICITY AND WATER  
20101230024409.000|20101230024411.000|CC1|AT NO CHARGE TO FARMERS, GIVING 
20101230024411.000|20101230024412.000|CC1|THEM VIRTUALLY NO INCENTIVE TO  
20101230024412.000|20101230024415.000|CC1|CONSERVE.                       
20101230024415.000|20101230024418.000|CC1|>> THE FARMER LOBBY IS VERY     
20101230024418.000|20101230024418.000|CC1|POWERFUL AND ELECTORALLY IN     
20101230024418.000|20101230024421.000|CC1|INDIA.                          
20101230024421.000|20101230024422.000|CC1|THEREFORE YOU HAVE THE POLITICS 
20101230024422.000|20101230024426.000|CC1|OF POPULISM, WHICH ENCOURAGES   
20101230024426.000|20101230024427.000|CC1|INEFFICIENT WATER MANAGEMENT AND
20101230024427.000|20101230024431.000|CC1|WATER UTILIZATIONS.             
20101230024431.000|20101230024431.000|CC1|IT'S A VERY EMOTIVE AND         
20101230024431.000|20101230024435.000|CC1|POLITICAL ISSUE.                
20101230024435.000|20101230024438.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SO IS THE ISSUE OF 
20101230024438.000|20101230024439.000|CC1|POPULATION CONTROL, EVEN THOUGH 
20101230024439.000|20101230024440.000|CC1|FEWER PEOPLE WOULD SEEM LIKE A  
20101230024440.000|20101230024442.000|CC1|SOLUTION TO DWINDLING RESOURCES.
20101230024442.000|20101230024443.000|CC1|TO BEGIN, ASHISH BOSE SAYS      
20101230024443.000|20101230024445.000|CC1|ECONOMICS DETERMINES FAMILY     
20101230024445.000|20101230024447.000|CC1|SIZE, ESPECIALLY IN POOR        
20101230024447.000|20101230024448.000|CC1|FAMILIES WHERE CHILDREN ARE A   
20101230024448.000|20101230024451.000|CC1|SORT OF RETIREMENT PLAN.        
20101230024451.000|20101230024452.000|CC1|>> IN INDIA, WE DON'T HAVE      
20101230024452.000|20101230024455.000|CC1|SOCIAL SECURITY FOR ELDERLY     
20101230024455.000|20101230024457.000|CC1|PEOPLE, SO ONLY THEY HAVE TO    
20101230024457.000|20101230024457.000|CC1|RELY ON CHILDREN AND ONLY ON    
20101230024457.000|20101230024459.000|CC1|SONS.                           
20101230024459.000|20101230024502.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BOSE, ONE OF       
20101230024502.000|20101230024503.000|CC1|INDIA'S LEADING DEMOGRAPHERS,   
20101230024503.000|20101230024504.000|CC1|SAYS THE GOVERNMENT OF INDIRA   
20101230024504.000|20101230024504.000|CC1|GANDHI LAUNCHED FAMILY PLANNING 
20101230024504.000|20101230024506.000|CC1|PROGRAMS IN THE 1970s THAT WERE 
20101230024506.000|20101230024511.000|CC1|WIDELY PERCEIVED AS COERCIVE,   
20101230024511.000|20101230024512.000|CC1|LEADING TO THE GOVERNMENT'S     
20101230024512.000|20101230024513.000|CC1|DEFEAT AT THE BALLOT BOX.       
20101230024513.000|20101230024514.000|CC1|IT WAS A HUGE SETBACK TO ANY    
20101230024514.000|20101230024516.000|CC1|CONCERTED GOVERNMENT FAMILY     
20101230024516.000|20101230024522.000|CC1|PLANNING PROGRAM.               
20101230024522.000|20101230024522.000|CC1|AND YET, EVEN AS THE GROWING    
20101230024522.000|20101230024523.000|CC1|POPULATION MAKES LIFE HARDER AND
20101230024523.000|20101230024525.000|CC1|HARDER, BOSE SAYS THE PROBLEM IS
20101230024525.000|20101230024527.000|CC1|RARELY TACKLED HEAD ON.         
20101230024527.000|20101230024528.000|CC1|>> THEY CONCEDE THAT THERE ARE  
20101230024528.000|20101230024534.000|CC1|TOO MANY PEOPLE AND THAT        
20101230024534.000|20101230024534.000|CC1|EVERYWHERE YOU GO, THERE IS A   
20101230024534.000|20101230024536.000|CC1|LONG QUEUE.                     
20101230024536.000|20101230024537.000|CC1|IF YOU GO FOR A FREE HEALTH, FOR
20101230024537.000|20101230024540.000|CC1|EXAMPLE, IF YOU HAVE AN         
20101230024540.000|20101230024541.000|CC1|EMERGENCY, THEY SAY, YOU COME   
20101230024541.000|20101230024543.000|CC1|AFTER THREE DAYS BECAUSE THERE  
20101230024543.000|20101230024546.000|CC1|ARE SO MANY PEOPLE IN LINE.     
20101230024546.000|20101230024547.000|CC1|>> Reporter: COME AFTER THREE   
20101230024547.000|20101230024548.000|CC1|DAYS IN AN EMERGENCY?           
20101230024548.000|20101230024549.000|CC1|>> YES!                         
20101230024549.000|20101230024550.000|CC1|SO THEN HE HAS TO GO TO A       
20101230024550.000|20101230024553.000|CC1|PRIVATE DOCTOR, SHELL OUT MONEY,
20101230024553.000|20101230024554.000|CC1|BORROW MONEY FROM A FRIEND AND  
20101230024554.000|20101230024557.000|CC1|GO TO A PRIVATE DOCTOR.         
20101230024557.000|20101230024559.000|CC1|SO THEY REALIZE BUT THEN THEY   
20101230024559.000|20101230024601.000|CC1|SAY GOVERNMENT SHOULD HAVE DONE 
20101230024601.000|20101230024605.000|CC1|ENOUGH FOR US BY DEVELOPING GOOD

20101230024612.000|20101230024613.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND HE SAYS INDIA'S
20101230024613.000|20101230024615.000|CC1|ONLY OPTION IS DEVELOPMENT.     
20101230024615.000|20101230024617.000|CC1|IMPROVING PEOPLE'S ECONOMIC     
20101230024617.000|20101230024618.000|CC1|SECURITY WILL REDUCE FAMILY

20101230024624.000|20101230024625.000|CC1|SAID THAT DEVELOPMENT IS THE    
20101230024625.000|20101230024627.000|CC1|BEST CONTRACEPTIVE.

20101230024629.000|20101230024630.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IRONICALLY, INDIA  
20101230024630.000|20101230024631.000|CC1|HAS ONE OF THE WORLD'S FASTEST  
20101230024631.000|20101230024635.000|CC1|RATES OF DEVELOPMENT, AT LEAST  
20101230024635.000|20101230024642.000|CC1|MEASURED BY ECONOMIC GROWTH.    
20101230024642.000|20101230024642.000|CC1|A POPULATION THAT'S PROJECTED TO
20101230024642.000|20101230024648.000|CC1|REACH 1.6 BILLION BEFORE        
20101230024648.000|20101230024649.000|CC1|>> Suarez: FRED'S REPORT WAS A  
20101230024649.000|20101230024650.000|CC1|PARTNERSHIP WITH THE PULITZER   
20101230024650.000|20101230024651.000|CC1|CENTER ON CRISIS REPORTING AND  
20101230024651.000|20101230024652.000|CC1|THE UNDER-TOLD STORIES PROJECT  
20101230024652.000|20101230024653.000|CC1|AT SAINT MARY'S UNIVERSITY IN   
20101230024653.000|20101230024656.000|CC1|MINNESOTA.                      
20101230024656.000|20101230024657.000|CC1|>> Ifill: FINALLY TONIGHT, THE  
20101230024657.000|20101230024700.000|CC1|STORY OF LIFELONG FRIENDS-- AN  
20101230024700.000|20101230024701.000|CC1|ARTIST AND A ROCK STAR.         
20101230024701.000|20101230024702.000|CC1|JEFFREY BROWN HAS OUR BOOK      
20101230024702.000|20101230024709.000|CC1|CONVERSATION.                   
20101230024709.000|20101230024710.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN LATE 1960'S AND 
20101230024710.000|20101230024712.000|CC1|EARLY 1970'S NEW YORK, PATTI    
20101230024712.000|20101230024714.000|CC1|SMITH AND ROBERT MAPLE THORPE   
20101230024714.000|20101230024716.000|CC1|WERE UNKNOWNS.                  
20101230024716.000|20101230024719.000|CC1|YOUNG FRIENDS SETTING OUT TO    
20101230024719.000|20101230024722.000|CC1|MAKE THEMSELVES ARTISTS AGAINST 
20101230024722.000|20101230024723.000|CC1|CHANGE.                         
20101230024723.000|20101230024724.000|CC1|MAPLETHORPE WENT ON TO BECOME   
20101230024724.000|20101230024726.000|CC1|ONE OF THE MOST CONTROVERSIAL   
20101230024726.000|20101230024729.000|CC1|ARTISTS OF HIS TIME BEFORE HE   
20101230024729.000|20101230024731.000|CC1|DIED OF AIDS.                   
20101230024731.000|20101230024733.000|CC1|PATTI SMITH MERGED POETRY WITH  
20101230024733.000|20101230024734.000|CC1|ROCK AND ROLL.                  
20101230024734.000|20101230024736.000|CC1|SHE WAS INDUCTED INTO THE ROCK  
20101230024736.000|20101230024737.000|CC1|AND ROLL HALL OF FAME IN 2007.  
20101230024737.000|20101230024738.000|CC1|SHE TELLS THE STORY OF THOSE    
20101230024738.000|20101230024742.000|CC1|EARLY YEARS IN A MEMOIR TITLED  
20101230024742.000|20101230024744.000|CC1|"JUST KIDS" WHICH WON THE       
20101230024744.000|20101230024747.000|CC1|NATIONAL BOOK AWARD FOR         
20101230024747.000|20101230024748.000|CC1|NONFICTION.                     
20101230024748.000|20101230024751.000|CC1|PATTI SMITH JOINS ME.           
20101230024751.000|20101230024753.000|CC1|THIS BOOK GOES BACK TO BEFORE   
20101230024753.000|20101230024755.000|CC1|YOU WERE YOU, THE PUBLIC FIGURE.
20101230024755.000|20101230024758.000|CC1|WHY DID YOU WANT TO LOOK AT     
20101230024758.000|20101230024759.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20101230024759.000|20101230024800.000|CC1|>> THE DAY BEFORE ROBERT DIED,  
20101230024800.000|20101230024802.000|CC1|WE KNEW HE WAS DYING AND BECAUSE
20101230024802.000|20101230024805.000|CC1|WE HAD COLLABORATED FOR SO MANY 
20101230024805.000|20101230024806.000|CC1|YEARS, I ASKED HIM WHAT HE      
20101230024806.000|20101230024808.000|CC1|WANTED ME TO DO TO CONTINUE     
20101230024808.000|20101230024810.000|CC1|WORKING WITH HIM IN THE BEST WAY
20101230024810.000|20101230024812.000|CC1|I COULD.                        
20101230024812.000|20101230024813.000|CC1|THEN HE SAID, "WOULD YOU TELL   
20101230024813.000|20101230024815.000|CC1|OUR STORY.                      
20101230024815.000|20101230024815.000|CC1|YOU'RE THE ONLY ONE THAT COULD  
20101230024815.000|20101230024822.000|CC1|TELL IT."                       
20101230024822.000|20101230024824.000|CC1|OUR STORY STARTED WHEN WE WERE  
20101230024824.000|20101230024826.000|CC1|20 YEARS OLD AND IT BEGAN, THE  
20101230024826.000|20101230024835.000|CC1|TWO OF US WERE UNKNOWN.         
20101230024835.000|20101230024839.000|CC1|WE EVOLVED AS ARTISTS AND HUMAN 
20101230024839.000|20101230024839.000|CC1|PECULIARS TOGETHER.             
20101230024839.000|20101230024841.000|CC1|>> Ifill: YOU COULD SEE IT      
20101230024841.000|20101230024843.000|CC1|COMING THROUGH, THE ASPIRATION  
20101230024843.000|20101230024847.000|CC1|TO ART BUT TRYING TO CHANNEL IT 
20101230024847.000|20101230024848.000|CC1|SOMEHOW.                        
20101230024848.000|20101230024850.000|CC1|>> BOTH OF US HAD A MISSION.    
20101230024850.000|20101230024852.000|CC1|ROBERT REALLY BELIEVED IN       
20101230024852.000|20101230024853.000|CC1|HIMSELF.                        
20101230024853.000|20101230024856.000|CC1|ROBERT WAS A VERY INTERESTING   
20101230024856.000|20101230024859.000|CC1|BOY, BECAUSE HE WAS QUITE SHY   
20101230024859.000|20101230024902.000|CC1|YET ABSOLUTELY CONFIDENT IN HIS 
20101230024902.000|20101230024906.000|CC1|ABILITIES AND THAT HE WOULD     
20101230024906.000|20101230024909.000|CC1|SOMEDAY ACHIEVE ACCLAIM.        
20101230024909.000|20101230024910.000|CC1|HE SAW --                       
20101230024910.000|20101230024912.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HE KNEW THAT?      
20101230024912.000|20101230024913.000|CC1|HE FELT THAT?                   
20101230024913.000|20101230024914.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20101230024914.000|20101230024916.000|CC1|I HAD A LOT OF BRAVADO IN THAT I
20101230024916.000|20101230024918.000|CC1|COULD MAKE A LIVING, I HAD NO   
20101230024918.000|20101230024920.000|CC1|FEAR, BUT I DIDN'T HAVE AS MUCH 
20101230024920.000|20101230024924.000|CC1|CONFIDENCE IN MYSELF AS AN      
20101230024924.000|20101230024928.000|CC1|ARTIST AND I THINK ALCHEMICALLY 
20101230024928.000|20101230024929.000|CC1|WE TRADED OFF.                  
20101230024929.000|20101230024931.000|CC1|HE INSTILLED HIS CONFIDENCE IN  
20101230024931.000|20101230024933.000|CC1|ME AND I HELPED TAKE CARE OF US 
20101230024933.000|20101230024934.000|CC1|SO WE HELPED EACH OTHER FIND OUR
20101230024934.000|20101230024938.000|CC1|PATHS.                          
20101230024938.000|20101230024939.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE ARE A LOST   
20101230024939.000|20101230024940.000|CC1|FAMOUS PEOPLE THAT MOVE IN AND  
20101230024940.000|20101230024942.000|CC1|OUT OF THE STORY, SOMETIMES IN  
20101230024942.000|20101230024948.000|CC1|THE BACKGROUND, ROCK STARS JANIS
20101230024948.000|20101230024951.000|CC1|JOPLIN, JI MI HENDRIX, AND YOU  
20101230024951.000|20101230024952.000|CC1|WRITE "I WAS THERE FOR THESE    
20101230024952.000|20101230024954.000|CC1|MOMENTS BUT SO YOUNG AND        
20101230024954.000|20101230024955.000|CC1|PREOCCUPIED WITH MY OWN THOUGHTS
20101230024955.000|20101230024957.000|CC1|THAT I HARDLY RECOGNIZED THEM AS
20101230024957.000|20101230024957.000|CC1|MOMENTS."                       
20101230024957.000|20101230024959.000|CC1|IT'S INTERESTING THAT WE DON'T  
20101230024959.000|20101230025000.000|CC1|RECOGNIZE OUR MOMENTS AS WE'RE  
20101230025000.000|20101230025001.000|CC1|LIVING.                         
20101230025001.000|20101230025001.000|CC1|>> IT'S TRUE.                   
20101230025001.000|20101230025007.000|CC1|I WAS SITTING AT THE FEET OF    
20101230025007.000|20101230025009.000|CC1|JANICE JOPLIN AS CHRIS          
20101230025009.000|20101230025010.000|CC1|KRISTOFFERSON WAS TEACHING HER  
20101230025010.000|20101230025012.000|CC1|BOBBY MCGEE AND PREOCCUPIED WITH
20101230025012.000|20101230025014.000|CC1|A POEM I WAS TRYING TO WRITE.   
20101230025014.000|20101230025016.000|CC1|I THINK THAT'S NORMAL FOR YOUNG 
20101230025016.000|20101230025017.000|CC1|ARTISTS.                        
20101230025017.000|20101230025019.000|CC1|THESE PEOPLE WERE ONLY A FEW    
20101230025019.000|20101230025021.000|CC1|YEARS OLDER THAN ME AND IT WAS A
20101230025021.000|20101230025023.000|CC1|TIME WHERE THE CULT OF CELEBRITY
20101230025023.000|20101230025026.000|CC1|WASN'T SO BIG, AND WE WEREN'T SO
20101230025026.000|20101230025027.000|CC1|SEPARATED FROM -- FROM THE      
20101230025027.000|20101230025029.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO WERE CREATING OUR    
20101230025029.000|20101230025031.000|CC1|CULTURAL VOICE, BECAUSE WE WERE 
20101230025031.000|20101230025034.000|CC1|ALSO TRYING TO ADD TO IT        
20101230025034.000|20101230025037.000|CC1|SIMULTANEOUSLY, AND WE WERE ALL 
20101230025037.000|20101230025039.000|CC1|LIVING IN THE SAME HOUSE, THE   
20101230025039.000|20101230025040.000|CC1|CHELSEA HOTEL.                  
20101230025040.000|20101230025041.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHICH WAS QUITE A  
20101230025041.000|20101230025042.000|CC1|PLACE IN ITSELF.                
20101230025042.000|20101230025043.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20101230025043.000|20101230025044.000|CC1|A LAND MARK.                    
20101230025044.000|20101230025046.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AT ONE TIME, YOU   
20101230025046.000|20101230025048.000|CC1|DESCRIBED YOUR WORK AS THREE    
20101230025048.000|20101230025049.000|CC1|CORDS MERGED WITH THE POWER OF  
20101230025049.000|20101230025050.000|CC1|THE WORD.                       
20101230025050.000|20101230025052.000|CC1|WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?            
20101230025052.000|20101230025053.000|CC1|HOW DO YOU SEE WHAT THE POWER OF
20101230025053.000|20101230025054.000|CC1|-- WHAT DOES THAT BECOME FOR    
20101230025054.000|20101230025055.000|CC1|YOU?                            
20101230025055.000|20101230025058.000|CC1|>> I BEGAN, OF COURSE, AS A     
20101230025058.000|20101230025059.000|CC1|POET, BUT THE POWER OF ROCK AND 
20101230025059.000|20101230025101.000|CC1|ROLL -- ROCK AND ROLL WAS REALLY
20101230025101.000|20101230025103.000|CC1|THE CANOPY OF OUR CULTURAL      
20101230025103.000|20101230025105.000|CC1|VOICE, AND ESPECIALLY IN THE    
20101230025105.000|20101230025110.000|CC1|1960'S -- LATE 1960'S AND EARLY 
20101230025110.000|20101230025111.000|CC1|1970'S, AND OUR ROCK STARS --   
20101230025111.000|20101230025112.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE WHO WERE BUILDING    
20101230025112.000|20101230025115.000|CC1|THAT VOICE, WHETHER IT WAS JOHN 
20101230025115.000|20101230025119.000|CC1|LENNON OR NEIL YOUNG OR BOB     
20101230025119.000|20101230025123.000|CC1|DYLAN, WHOEVER IT WAS, THEY WERE
20101230025123.000|20101230025127.000|CC1|INFUSING POLITICS AND POLITICAL 
20101230025127.000|20101230025130.000|CC1|IDEOLOGY, SOCIAL JUSTICE, SEXUAL
20101230025130.000|20101230025133.000|CC1|ENERGY, POETICS, ALL WITHIN THE 
20101230025133.000|20101230025134.000|CC1|CAN OPEN OF ROCK AND ROLL AND   
20101230025134.000|20101230025136.000|CC1|STRIVING TO MAKE THIS A         
20101230025136.000|20101230025137.000|CC1|UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE.             
20101230025137.000|20101230025140.000|CC1|IT WAS A REAL MISSION.          
20101230025140.000|20101230025144.000|CC1|AND I WANTED TO ADD TO THAT.    
20101230025144.000|20101230025146.000|CC1|WRITING POETRY IS BEAUTIFUL, BUT
20101230025146.000|20101230025148.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS YOUNG I WANTED TO BE 
20101230025148.000|20101230025151.000|CC1|PART OF THIS IMPORTANT CULTURAL 
20101230025151.000|20101230025154.000|CC1|VOICE, AND SO MERGING THE       
20101230025154.000|20101230025156.000|CC1|SIMPLISTIC ASPECTS OF ROCK AND  
20101230025156.000|20101230025158.000|CC1|ROLL -- THREE CHORDS, CLASSIC   
20101230025158.000|20101230025201.000|CC1|THREE CHORDS, SONGS LIKE        
20101230025201.000|20101230025203.000|CC1|"GLORIA" OR "LAND OF A THOUSAND 
20101230025203.000|20101230025205.000|CC1|DANCES" WITH MY OWN POETRY, THAT
20101230025205.000|20101230025208.000|CC1|KIND OF FUSION IS WHAT PROPELLED
20101230025208.000|20101230025211.000|CC1|ME ON -- MY BAND ON.            
20101230025211.000|20101230025212.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU SAID -- IT WAS 
20101230025212.000|20101230025214.000|CC1|VERY INTERESTING -- AT THE      
20101230025214.000|20101230025215.000|CC1|AWARDS CEREMONY WHEN YOU WERE   
20101230025215.000|20101230025216.000|CC1|GIVEN THE NATIONAL BOOK AWARD,  
20101230025216.000|20101230025218.000|CC1|YOU LOOKED BACK, WHICH IS ALSO  
20101230025218.000|20101230025220.000|CC1|TALKED ABOUT IN THE BOOK TO THE 
20101230025220.000|20101230025225.000|CC1|DAYS WHEN YOU WERE A CLERK AT A 
20101230025225.000|20101230025226.000|CC1|BOOK STORE --                   
20101230025226.000|20101230025227.000|CC1|>> GREGGNER'S.                  
20101230025227.000|20101230025228.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU SAID YOU       
20101230025228.000|20101230025229.000|CC1|DREAMED OF WRITING YOUR OWN     
20101230025229.000|20101230025230.000|CC1|BOOK.                           
20101230025230.000|20101230025231.000|CC1|>> I DREAMED OF WRITING A BOOK  
20101230025231.000|20101230025233.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS A CHILD, READING     
20101230025233.000|20101230025236.000|CC1|"LITTLE WOMEN," READING         
20101230025236.000|20101230025238.000|CC1|"PINNOCHIO," "MOBY DICK."       
20101230025238.000|20101230025239.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BOOKS ARE IMPORTANT
20101230025239.000|20101230025240.000|CC1|TO YOU?                         
20101230025240.000|20101230025242.000|CC1|>> ALWAYS, ALWAYS.              
20101230025242.000|20101230025243.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT SEEMED LIKE YOUR
20101230025243.000|20101230025245.000|CC1|WAY INTO ANOTHER LIFE.          
20101230025245.000|20101230025247.000|CC1|>> I BEGGED MY MOTHER TO TEACH  
20101230025247.000|20101230025248.000|CC1|ME TO READ.                     
20101230025248.000|20101230025250.000|CC1|MY POOR MOTHER WAS A WAITRESS   
20101230025250.000|20101230025252.000|CC1|AND DID IRONING AND HAD FOUR    
20101230025252.000|20101230025252.000|CC1|CHILDREN.                       
20101230025252.000|20101230025254.000|CC1|I BEGGED HER TO TEACH ME.       
20101230025254.000|20101230025255.000|CC1|SHE WOULD COME HOME AND LABOR   
20101230025255.000|20101230025257.000|CC1|AND DO HER BEST AND SHE DID.    
20101230025257.000|20101230025300.000|CC1|SHE TAUGHT ME TO READ.          
20101230025300.000|20101230025303.000|CC1|I JUST DEVOURED EVERY BOOK IN   
20101230025303.000|20101230025303.000|CC1|SIGHT.                          
20101230025303.000|20101230025304.000|CC1|I HAVE ALWAYS LOVED BOOKS.      
20101230025304.000|20101230025305.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HOW MUCH DID IT    
20101230025305.000|20101230025307.000|CC1|MEAN TO NOT ONLY WRITE A BOOK   
20101230025307.000|20101230025309.000|CC1|BUT THEN WIN THIS MAJOR AWARD?  
20101230025309.000|20101230025310.000|CC1|>> I WAS SO EXCITED.            
20101230025310.000|20101230025312.000|CC1|I MEAN, I -- I COULD HARDLY     
20101230025312.000|20101230025312.000|CC1|SPEAK.                          
20101230025312.000|20101230025314.000|CC1|I REALLY -- I JUST BURST INTO   
20101230025314.000|20101230025318.000|CC1|TIERCE AND STILL, WHIWALK DOWN  
20101230025318.000|20101230025320.000|CC1|THE STREET, ALL OF A SUDDEN I   
20101230025320.000|20101230025321.000|CC1|STARTED SMILING.                
20101230025321.000|20101230025322.000|CC1|I'M SO HAPPY.                   
20101230025322.000|20101230025323.000|CC1|IT'S NOT WHY WE DO OUR WORK.    
20101230025323.000|20101230025326.000|CC1|WE DON'T DO OUR WORK TO ACHIEVE 
20101230025326.000|20101230025327.000|CC1|ACCOLADES.                      
20101230025327.000|20101230025331.000|CC1|WE DO OUR WORK TO DO GOOD WORK, 
20101230025331.000|20101230025332.000|CC1|BUT TO RECEIVE THEM IS -- IT'S  
20101230025332.000|20101230025335.000|CC1|-- WELL, IT'S EXCITING.         
20101230025335.000|20101230025338.000|CC1|IT MEANS -- THE OTHER THING IS  
20101230025338.000|20101230025341.000|CC1|THAT IT -- MORE THAN EVER, IT   
20101230025341.000|20101230025344.000|CC1|MEANS THAT THE STORY, WHICH MY  
20101230025344.000|20101230025346.000|CC1|MOTIVATION WAS TO GIVE ROBERT TO
20101230025346.000|20101230025348.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE -- REALLY GIVES THE  
20101230025348.000|20101230025351.000|CC1|PEOPLE MORE HOLISTIC IMAGE OF   
20101230025351.000|20101230025353.000|CC1|ROBERT -- IS EVEN MORE POSSIBLE 
20101230025353.000|20101230025354.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT MAKES THE BOOK MORE  
20101230025354.000|20101230025356.000|CC1|ACCESSIBLE TO OTHERS.           
20101230025356.000|20101230025358.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE BOOK IS CALLED 
20101230025358.000|20101230025400.000|CC1|"JUST KIDS," PATTI SMITH, IT'S  
20101230025400.000|20101230025407.000|CC1|NICE TO TALK TO YOU.
